caption: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines schema attributes and includes references to the events and objects in which they are used.
name: dictionary

audit_user.caption: Audit User
audit_user.description: The audit user assigned at login by the audit subsystem.

effective_user.caption: Effective User
effective_user.description: The effective user under which this process is running.

effective_group.caption: Effective Group
effective_group.description: The effective group under which this process is running.

namespace_pid.caption: Namespace PID
namespace_pid.description: If running under a process namespace (such as in a container), the process identifier within that process namespace.

orchestrator.caption: Orchestrator
orchestrator.description: The orchestrator managing the container, such as ECS, EKS, K8s, or OpenShift.

pod_id.caption: Pod ID
pod_id.description: The unique identifer of the pod (or equivalent) that the container is executing on.

runtime.caption: Runtime
runtime.description: The backend running the container, such as containerd or docker.
